metadata.title: Matias Bacelar
metadata.description: Matias Bacelar is a front-end focused software developer who likes to build interfaces & digital experiences for the web.

title.second: a front-end focused software developer who likes to build interfaces & digital experiences for

content.text: I started programming for fun and without realizing it, programming became a hobby and then a profession. I enjoy building interfaces that are useful without losing the aesthetics of the application as I believe that usability and aesthetics are equally important.
These are some of the technologies that I normally use for my personal projects and professionally:

info.firstItem: Built an application to generate reports based on agronomic information on soil studies, where I used the mapbox library to generate dynamic data-driven maps to visualize soil properties.
info.secondItem: Develop a tool to dynamically visualize soil study reports on a map; develop functionalities such as maps with data-driven layers, layer comparison, synchronization of multiple maps, multi-layers, ruler tool, among others.

info.firstItem: Developed and maintained code for the company software (Collaborative E-sourcing platform) with React and his ecosystem.
info.secondItem: Implement performance improvements to the Collaborative E-sourcing platform to improve loading times.

info.firstItem: Build a website for the SPB Circle of Officers using with React and his ecosystem.
info.secondItem: Build a website call Tiendas Platenses with Wordpress and PHP.

projects.name: Snapcode
projects.info: Snapcode is an application to create code snippets, download, save and delete them using GitHub as authentication provider & Supabase.

projects.name: Moderne
projects.info: Moderne is an app for a fictional high tech property construction company, in this project the focus is on animations using both Framer Motion and CSS.

projects.name: Portfolio v1
projects.info: First version of my portfolio build with Next JS (SSG) in the frontend and and Strapi CMS as a backend.

footerSection.title: Let’s talk   +
footerSection.message: If you want to contact me to ask me something my inbox is always open.
